Container.Name: HTPC-Manager
Container.Description: HTPC-Manager allows you to manage your HTPC from anywhere. More Info: http://htpc.io/[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the configuration and the database files of HTPC-Manager.[br] [b]NZBDRONE[/b] : Add "1" to the Variable Value without the quotes to use the NZBDrone version (https://github.com/Hellowlol/HTPC-Manager GIT)(Cannot use both NZBDRONE and EDGE) [br] [b]EDGE[/b] : Add "1" to the Variable Value without the quotes to use the EDGE version (Cannot use both NZBDRONE and EDGE) [br]
